description: This file defines a React component named 'Rail' that displays a horizontally scrollable list of thumbnail items with keyboard navigation, lazy loading, and focus management. It imports React hooks, a custom hook for Tizen key handling, and a ThumbnailCard component.

methods.name: Rail({ title, items = [], railIndex = 0, currentRail, setCurrentRail, onOpenDetails, loading = false, error = null })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a horizontally scrollable list of thumbnails with keyboard navigation and focus management.

ctags.signature: ({ title, items = [], railIndex = 0, currentRail, setCurrentRail, onOpenDetails, loading = false, error = null })
